title: Lost Words, Broken Promises
alternative_title: Ushinawa re ta kotoba yabura re ta yakusoku
status: Ushinawa re ta kotoba yabura re ta yakusoku
description:
Description :
        Lost words, broken promises is a romance manga about Suraj and Asuna, two teenagers from different backgrounds who meet and fall in love at a high school in Tokyo. Their relationship faces a major challenge when Suraj reveals that he is losing his hearing due to a medical condition. Together, they overcome this obstacle by learning sign language and embracing deaf culture. Their love story inspires others to overcome their own challenges and pursue their dreams.+
